title: Policy combo to reduce demand-pull inflation

content.question: Which of the following combinations of policies is most effective in reducing demand-pull inflation?

choices.label: A decrease in personal income taxes and a decrease in administered interest rates
A decrease in personal income taxes and an increase in the discount rate
An increase in government spending and a decrease in the policy rate
A decrease in the discount rate and a decrease in transfer payments
An increase in administered interest rates and an increase in personal income taxes

content.answer: An increase in administered interest rates and an increase in personal income taxes
